text: Utøya is an island in the Tyrifjorden lake in Hole municipality, in the county of Buskerud, Norway. On 22 July 2011, Utøya was the site of a mass shooting carried out by Anders Behring Breivik. The terrorist attack killed 69 on or near the island. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Islands of Norway Category:Buskerud
title: Utøya
